metadata.name: Disable of ETW Trace - Powershell
metadata.comment: Detects usage of powershell cmdlets to disable or remove ETW trace sessions

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('remove-etwtraceprovider ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('set-etwtraceprovider ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('0x11')))

output.summary: Detects usage of powershell cmdlets to disable or remove ETW trace sessions
